handedness.Description: handedness of the participant as reported by the participant

treatment_group.Description: treatment group of the participant; double-blind design

Levels.PL: participants who received the placebo intranasal spray
Levels.OT: participants who received the oxytocin intranasal spray

years_of_education.Description: number of years of education as reported by the participant

self_report_race.Description: race of the participant as reported by the participant

self_report_ethnicity.Description: ethnicity of the participant as reported by the participant

Levels.NA: participant did not report their ethnicity

bmi.Description: body mass index calculated from the participant's self reported weight and height
